original_title: The Great and Terrible Day of the Lord
overview: On Michael and Gabby's first romantic get-away things takes a terrifying turn when God delivers unsettling news to Gabby after taking over Michael's body. Is Michael a manipulative psychopath or could this really be a direct experience with her creator offering a path to eternal happiness?
tagline: She was warned, He works in mysterious ways.
title: The Great and Terrible Day of the Lord
